duties_responsibilities.duty: Achieve all sales and service metrics through daily supervision and mentorship of retail sales team.
Proactively coach and develop store teams to perform their responsibilities at a high level.
Ensure store environment consistently follows published planograms and branding standards.
Coordinate all daily sales floor responsibilities, including accurate and efficient staffing and scheduling, dress code compliance, sales huddles, and resolution of customer issues.
Drive operational excellence with a focus on inventory management and store inventory cycle counts.
Review store reports looking for improvement opportunities in the areas of sales, inventory, cash handling, efficiency, and net promoter system (NPS).
Coach team members on how to position all products with customers and ensure customers are treated with the highest levels of courtesy and integrity.
Remain current on new and current products and services, industry, and competitive trends and reinforce findings with the team.
Coordinate cash handling policies and procedures and demonstrate available tools to supervise customer feedback, mentor, and take action to improve the store experience.
Build collaborative relationships with market and region partners.
Must be able to carry and lift up to 25-pound boxes, stand and move about the store constantly. Must be able to work nights and weekends, variable schedule(s), and overtime as vital.
Other duties and responsibilities as assigned.
